signUp.signUpSuccessInfo: Please check your email for instructions to verify your account.
signUp.passwordRules: Use at least one letter, one numeral, and seven characters.

forgotPassword.subHeader: Please enter your email address and you should shortly be receiving instructions to reset your password.

confirmUser.successSubTitle: Thank you for conforming your account {{firstName}}, now you can log in with your credentials.
confirmUser.errorSubTitle: Sorry, we could not confirm your account. Please make sure that you are using the correct URL you received in your confirmation email and try again later.

notFound.title: The page you are looking for was not found!
notFound.subTitle: Please return to the home page.

home.appDescription: Softup X acts as a reliable boilerplate for Softup developers. It offers a React TypeScript template through Vite, providing a strong and structured foundation for new endeavors. Its primary aim is to assist developers by showcasing best coding practices, ensuring a smooth initiation into projects. The application efficiently manages data flow using React Query, optimizing information dissemination within the system. Additionally, Softup X integrates I18next for seamless translations, enabling easy development of multilingual applications. Employing Ant Design as its UI library, it enhances both the aesthetics and functionality of the interface. Softup X is more than just a starting point; it's a comprehensive solution that not only expedites project initiation but also sets the standard for coding practices within the Softup ecosystem.

pageWithNavigation.footerText: Softup X ©2023 Created with ❤️ by Softup Technologies
